titleStmt.title: A defence of the Dean of St. Paul's Apology for writing against the Socinians in answer to the antapologist.
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Sherlock. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
